reviewText: Clear and to the point. What it shows it shows well.
I would have liked more examples of the actual mold making and casting process. Another source of information (such as a basic sand casting book) is necessary to understand the DVD.

This is a visual testament to Daves work and does a good job showing the furnace after it was fixed and how he makes a form from begining to finish. Wish he had shown how to build the furnace too. He shows off some of his other machines instead.

This is, without a doubt, the best and most entertaining video on sand casting there is. The information is presented in a concise, straight foward, and yet relaxed manor. If you have ever read any of Dave's books you'll understand what I mean. There is a little tom foolery,but it is a delight to watch. I think you will learn more with this video than you could reading ten books, by other writers.
